title: 求一些特殊类型的科技mod
author: 未来之空
txt_content: 类似飞向未来那种，带科技树，一个一个解

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2019-6-25 12:32 编辑 

签名档的整合包不妨可以试试，另外根据你的需要给你推荐几个整合包：
[1.12.2][魔改][空岛]This Is My World IV Trial of God —— 神之试炼
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-858670-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

[1.7.10][HQM][MT]This Is My World——这个世界是我的！魔改魔科整合包[v1.2.13]
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-654210-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)


科技mod：
AcademyCraft-1.0.6 https://ac.li-dev.cnappliedenergistics2-rv3-beta-10 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/applied-energistics-2buildcraft-7.1.23 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/buildcraftExtraUtilities-1.2.12 https://minecraft.curseforge.com ... ities/files/2264383GalacticraftCore-1.7-3.0.12.502 https://micdoodle8.comGalacticraft-Planets-1.7-3.0.12.502 https://micdoodle8.comMore-Planets-1.7.10-1.4.3-GC502 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-453885-1-1.htmlGraviSuite-1.7.10-2.0.3[TFCN] https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/gravitation-suiteIC2-Advanced-Solar-Panel-3.4.5 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/advanced-solar-panelsIC2NuclearControl-2.4.3a https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/nuclear-control-2ImmersiveEngineering-0.7.7 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/immersive-engineeringimmersiveintegration-0.6.8 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/immersive-integrationindustrialcraft-2-2.2.817-experimental https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/industrial-craftShinColle-1.7.10.rv26 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/shincolleUncomplication-1.7.10-0.1.2.1.b77 https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/uncomplication

replies.author: 未来之空
replies.txt_content: 我是想在服务器里面用，服务器用整合包不太好

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
未来之空 发表于 2019-6-25 12:32
我是想在服务器里面用，服务器用整合包不太好
嗯嗯，那看看我推荐的mod吧，一般要加科技线的话推荐任务书+魔改会比较有意思些

另外给你推荐整合包是让你有些思路，帖子上的mod都标有发布站地址，可以直接下载的，然后放到你的整合包里
